name: oncapintada
summary: On√ßa-pintada (pronounced as OHN-sah peen-TAH-dah) is a Python package designed for the analysis and simulation of atomic configurations in materials science. It provides tools to calculate Short-Range Order (SRO) parameters, generate Special Quasirandom Structures (SQS), and perform Monte Carlo Markov Chain (MCMC) simulations for various materials.
